code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ReserveDetails=()=>{const[reserveKm,setReserveKm]=useState("");const[alertTime,setAlertTime]=useState("6");const[saved,setSaved]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const savedData=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("reserveSettings"));if(savedData){setReserveKm(savedData.reserveKm);setAlertTime(savedData.alertTime);setSaved(true);}},[]);const handleSave=()=>{const data={reserveKm,alertTime};localStorage.setItem("reserveSettings",JSON.stringify(data));setSaved(true);alert("âœ… Reserve details saved!");const timeMs=parseInt(alertTime)*60*60*1000;setTimeout(()=>{alert(`â›½ Reminder: Your reserve is expected around ${reserveKm} km!`);},timeMs);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:"20px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83D\uDD14 Reserve Details & Alert"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Reserve Km",value:reserveKm,onChange:e=>setReserveKm(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Alert me after: "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:alertTime,onChange:e=>setAlertTime(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"6",children:"6 hrs"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"12",children:"12 hrs"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"24",children:"24 hrs"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSave,children:"Save Reserve Alert"}),saved&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\u2705 Saved Reserve: ",reserveKm," km | Alert in ",alertTime," hrs"]})]});};export default ReserveDetails;
